channel.title: Universal Gaming Top List
channel.description:
Advertise your server on our new top list: Universal Gaming - The Universal Capital of Online Gaming.
Features of Universal Gaming include listing sites by top votes, most clicked, recently submitted, and more. It's easy. All you have to do is sign up, add your site, a brief description, and a nice banner. After adding your site, you can add vote buttons for your site and on your website to get votes! Be sure to check this out.
[url=http://www.universalgaming.org]Universal Gaming[/url]
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/xefzq.png[/img]
